channel.title: ai on Shoals
channel.description: Recent content in ai on Shoals

item.title: Drawing the planet in brushstrokes
item.description: To take my mind off certain things, I’ve been experimenting with a novel style of cartography: cubism. I arrived here on a wave of hype via an app called Prisma — a nifty take on the “filter-and-share” photo paradigm; it applies a touch of machine learning to redraw your image in an array of artistic styles. You’ve definitely seen the results in the wild, sometimes stunning, sometimes godawful, usually determined by the quality of the source image.
